title: The Island of Dr. Moreau
description: Edward Prendick is shipwrecked and finds himself stranded on an island in the Pacific. Here he meets the sinister Dr. Moreau, a vivisectionist driven out of Britain in disgrace. Strange events soon cause Prendick to uncover the full horror of Dr. Moreau's activities on the island . . .This etext was created by Judith Boss, of Omaha, Nebraska, from the Garden City Publishing Company, 1896 edition, and first posted in August, 1994. Minor corrections made by Andrew Sly in October, 2004.
author: H.G. Wells
